title: Onboarding Tasks and Trainings
text: Completed several lab onboarding tasks, including the reviewing the PPE Hazard Assessment, Fire Extinguisher Training, and Managing Laboratory Chemicals Training, and submitted relevant documentation to Sam. Also emailed Sam to set up meeting time to go over relevant lab safety details in person.

title: First post
text: I think I successfully created my lab notebook!

title: Formatting digital lab notebook
text: I added my lab notebook to the lab website, so it is now publically viewable as a part of the Roberts Lab. I’ve also continued formatting it and looking into the Quarto documentation.
